word:
MR No. 245 - Nutrition

     Meat eating means animalism just to that degree in which we indulge in it. Our sensual passions need to be starved to death, not stimulated, that Christ may occupy the soul-temple. This is God's claim of love.--Letter 3, 1884, p. 8. (To "Dear Friends at the Health Retreat," Feb. 5, 1884.)
